tooltipDesc:
A well toned lizard woman with tanned skin, yellow scales, blonde hair in a pony tail, gleaming golden eyes, a powerful tail with a deceptively soft underside, and sharp claws.

She wears a minimum of red clothing under sparse armor plates and an assortment of golden jewelry.
